"use strict";exports.endOfMonth=endOfMonth;var _index=require("./toDate.js");/**
 * @name endOfMonth
 * @category Month Helpers
 * @summary Return the end of a month for the given date.
 *
 * @description
 * Return the end of a month for the given date.
 * The result will be in the local timezone.
 *
 * @typeParam DateType - The `Date` type, the function operates on. Gets inferred from passed arguments. Allows to use extensions like [`UTCDate`](https://github.com/date-fns/utc).
 *
 * @param date - The original date
 *
 * @returns The end of a month
 *
 * @example
 * // The end of a month for 2 September 2014 11:55:00:
 * const result = endOfMonth(new Date(2014, 8, 2, 11, 55, 0))
 * //=> Tue Sep 30 2014 23:59:59.999
 */function endOfMonth(date){const _date=(0,_index.toDate)(date);const month=_date.getMonth();_date.setFullYear(_date.getFullYear(),month+1,0);_date.setHours(23,59,59,999);return _date;}
